roleset.name: to wish, long, or crave for
roleset.note: COVET-V NOTES: Frames file for 'covet' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from covet.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: For some at the SEC , an agency that [*T*-1] covets its independence , Mr. Breeden may be too much of a Washington insider .
